Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This product is truly a testament to excellence and we believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection. For this unique opportunity, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $150. I understand that the true worth of this product may vary depending on your needs and preferences, but I am confident that this price reflects its superior quality and the benefits it offers. Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information about the product. I look forward to hearing your decision. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
